task.title: Editing/Adding links to the Project Menu
task.shortdesc: For each project you can customize your navigation buttons by using the Edit project menu in your dashboard.

step.cmd: Click on the Edit project menu option in the Utilities column (on the right side of the dashboard).

choices.choice: Click on Edit option associated with the page you would like to work with (beneath the operations column).
Click on the Add link button in the right corner.

step.cmd: Fill out the Edit project menu form. The title and path fields are required.
Click on Save to ingest your new project menu.
step.info: In the screenshot below, you can see the different project menu options. These are customized to that particular project.
